communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All emails from Kim Foxx, risa Lanier and Lynn Mccarthy for 2020 to David Brown, former superintendent.

All emails from Kim Foxx, risa Lanier and Lynn Mccarthy for 2021 to David Brown, former superintendent.

All emails from Kim Foxx, risa Lanier and Lynn Mccarthy for 2022 to David Brown, former superintendent.

All emails All emails from Kim Foxx, Risa Lanier, and Lynn Mccarthy for 2020 to the former chief of BIA


All emails All emails from Kim Foxx, Risa Lanier, and Lynn Mccarthy for 2021 to the former chief of BIA


All emails All emails from Kim Foxx, Risa Lanier, or Lynn Mccarthy for 2022 to the former chief of BIA.


 All emails from Kim Foxx, Risa Lanier, and Lynn Mccarthy for 2020 to the General Consul at that time.

 All emails from Kim Foxx, Risa Lanier, and Lynn Mccarthy for 2021 to the General Consul at that time.

 All emails from Kim Foxx, Risa Lanier, and Lynn Mccarthy for 2022 to the General Consul at that time.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J publi

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Kentucky Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Agreements related to the beverage pouring, distribution, or sales on campus or in athletics venues or facilities, including any related exclusive marketing agreements for beverage brands in those areas.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kelly North

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any policy manual, employee procedure manual, or folder of collected policies which guide police operations. This may be one document with many policies, or all policies collected.

The original format of the documents is acceptable (PDF, .doc, .txt, etc).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brian Barr
